Change description
Automate Document AM Scenarios for F-044: Submit event creation as Case worker

[x ] No

commit.message: RDM-7068:  Updated files for the feature

RDM-7068:  Updated as per Dev review comments
Merge branch 'RDM-6329_Automate_Newly_Identified_Test_Scenarios' of https://github.com/hmcts/ccd-data-store-api into RDM-7068_Automate_AM_Scenarios_for_F037_Create_EventV2-Updated

RDM-7067-Automate Document AM Scenarios for F-044: Submit event creation as Case worker

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>
RDM-7068:  improved inheritance and feedback comments from DEV review.

nodes.bodyText: Kindly remove the transfer encoding if the scenario is working in local machine.
At this point, we are dealing with only Solicitors. Can you please change the statement to have only "Solicitors" rather than caseworker and Solicitor?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -95,6 +95,26 @@ Feature: F-044: Submit event creation as Case worker
     And the response [contains an HTTP 404 'Not Found']
     And the response has all the details as expected
 
+  @S-579 # DM store related scenario
+  Scenario: must update successfully all and only the respective fields with update access for a Case Worker and a Solicitor

nodes.bodyText: [an active Solicitor profile in CCD with a specific variation of ACLs on a case type]

nodes.bodyText: The file name and GUID has a mismatch.
It is essentially a Solicitor now. Can you please rename the file to have solicitor in it rather than a caseworker.

commit.message:
RDM-7067-Automate Document AM Scenarios for F-044: Submit event creation as Case worker

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-Automate Document AM Scenarios for F-044: Submit event creation as Case worker

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>
Merge branch 'RDM-7068_Automate_AM_Scenarios_for_F037_Create_EventV2-Updated' into RDM-7067-Automate-Document-AM-Scenarios-for-F-044-Submit-event-creation-as-Case-worker
Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/RDM-6329_Automate_Newly_Identified_Test_Scenarios' into RDM-7067-Automate-Document-AM-Scenarios-for-F-044-Submit-event-creation-as-Case-worker

RDM-7067- for F-579- change - using common Befta_Jurisdiction2_Default_Full_Case_Data and Befta_Jurisdiction2_Default_Full_Case_Security_Classification

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-file name change -S-579-Update_Case_For_Solicitor_Data_Base

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-file name change -S-579-Update_Case_For_Solicitor_Data_Base

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-change data from dm-store:8080 to dm-store-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

Merge branch 'RDM-6329_Automate_Newly_Identified_Test_Scenarios' of https://github.com/hmcts/ccd-data-store-api into RDM-7067-Automate-Document-AM-Scenarios-for-F-044-Submit-event-creation-as-Case-worker

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

# Conflicts:
#	src/aat/resources/CCD_BEFTA_JURISDICTION2.xlsx
#	src/aat/resources/features/common/case/befta-jurisdiction2-case-creation/Befta_Jurisdiction2_Default_Full_Case_Data_Security_Classification.td.json

Merge branch 'RDM-6329_Automate_Newly_Identified_Test_Scenarios' of https://github.com/hmcts/ccd-data-store-api into RDM-7067-Automate-Document-AM-Scenarios-for-F-044-Submit-event-creation-as-Case-worker

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

# Conflicts:
#	src/aat/resources/CCD_BEFTA_JURISDICTION2.xlsx
#	src/aat/resources/features/common/case/befta-jurisdiction2-case-creation/Befta_Jurisdiction2_Default_Full_Case_Data_Security_Classification.td.json

RDM-7067-Delete files not required

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-Delete files not required

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-file name change Befta_Jurisdiction2_Default_Full_Case_Security_Classification

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-file name change S-579-Update_Case_For_Solicitor_Data_Base

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-change Case Worker to Solicitor

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-remove "Transfer-Encoding": "chunked"

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-DocumentField2 - document_filename change

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-Remove "Transfer-Encoding" : "chunked"

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-change Case Worker to Solicitor

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

RDM-7067-change for negative response

Signed-off-by: Sumit Shrivastava <sumitsavit@hotmail.com>

+{
+  "_guid_": "S-579_Get_Case_For_Case_Worker_Data_Base",
